thread.title: Salman Khan's special connection with 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' actors
thread.title_full: Salman Khan's special connection with 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' actors - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan's special connection with 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' actors
text:
Salman Khan is known for giving opportunities to newcomers in the industry. And now, he hopes that "Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2" that features Omkar Kapoor, who played the superstar's "bachpan" in "Judwaa", performs well at the box office .
The "Bajrangi Bhaijaan" star used the digital platform to tell his fans about the promo of ... Â»
